record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - February 28, 2008)

[Page: H1168]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 85 on S. 2272, I am not recorded because I was absent on the account of the birth of my granddaughter. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea." On rollcall No. 86 on H.R. 3936, had I been present, I would have voted "yea." On rollcall No. 87 on H.R. 4454, had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
